28 #include "Mixture.h"
29 #include "TransferModel.h"
30 
31 #include <cmath>
32 
33 #include <Eigen/Dense>
34 using namespace Eigen;
35 
36 namespace Mutation {
37  namespace Transfer {
38 
57 class OmegaET : public TransferModel
58 {
59 public:
60  OmegaET(TransferModel::ARGS mix) :
61  TransferModel(mix), m_collisions(mix.collisionDB()),
62  m_has_electrons(mix.hasElectrons())
63  { }
64 
65  double source()
66  {
67  if (!m_has_electrons)
68  return 0.0;
69 
70  const double * p_X = mixture().X();
71  double nd = mixture().numberDensity();
72  double T = mixture().T();
73  double Te = mixture().Te();
74 
75  const double ns = mixture().nSpecies();
76  Map<const ArrayXd> X(mixture().X(),ns);
77 
78  // CollisionDB data
79  const ArrayXd& Q11ei = m_collisions.Q11ei();
80  const ArrayXd& mass = m_collisions.mass();
81 
82  // Electron velocity
83  double ve = sqrt(KB*8.*Te/(PI*mass(0)));
84  double tau = 1.0/(mass(0)*8./3.*ve*nd*(X*Q11ei/mass).tail(ns-1).sum());
85 
86  return 1.5*KB*nd*p_X[0]*(T-Te)/tau;
87  }
88 
89 private:
90  Transport::CollisionDB& m_collisions;
91  bool m_has_electrons;
92 
93 };
94 
95 
96 // Register the transfer model
97 Mutation::Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<
98  OmegaET, TransferModel> omegaET("OmegaET");
99 
100  } // namespace Transfer
101 } // namespace Mutation
